channel.title: CVE Feed for libxls -- libxls
channel.description: The latest CVEs for libxls -- libxls

item.title: CVE-2017-2919|2024-08-05T14:09:17.762Z -- libxls -- libxls
item.description: An exploitable stack based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the xls_getfcell function of libxls 1.3.4. A specially crafted XLS file can cause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability

item.title: CVE-2017-2896|2024-08-05T14:09:17.301Z -- libxls -- libxls
item.description: An exploitable out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the xls_mergedCells function of libxls 1.4. . A specially crafted XLS file can cause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-2897|2024-08-05T14:09:17.445Z -- libxls -- libxls
item.description: An exploitable out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the read_MSAT function of libxls 1.4. A specially crafted XLS file can cause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability.
